info.title: Essential life API
info.description: REST API consumed by Essential Life IOS and Android app

400.description: The Japanese language is not supported. Please contact support.

200.description: Thanks, password reset details have been sent to your email.

404.description: We can't find a user with that e-mail address.
This password reset token is invalid.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Paramater to sort by.

To toggle ASC/DESC preceed the parameter with a '-'.

Allowed sort parameters:
  • name
  • views_count
